channel.title: Need help
channel.description:
how do i make admin or mod yell saying like this
example ::yell hello
and it show on text [owner]drask182-hello

item.title: Need help
item.dc:creator: @BurnInSilence BurnInSilence
item.description:
@BurnInSilence wrote:

else if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5) { if(muted == 1) sendMessage("You are muted and cannot yell!"); else if(playerRights == 1){ PlayerHandler.messageToAll = [Mod]playerName+": "+command.substring(5);} else if(playerRights == 2){ PlayerHandler.messageToAll = [Admin]playerName+": "+command.substring(5);} else if(playerRights == 3){ PlayerHandler.messageToAll = [Owner]playerName+": "+command.substring(5);} else PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+": "+command.substring(5); }

Read full topic
